name: Prefix Sum Array
description:
# Prefix Sum Array

Given an array of N integers {A-1, A-2,..., A-N},
calculate the sum of its prefix sum array {S-1, S-2,...,S-N}.

The value of the i-th element in the prefix sum array is the sum of all elements of the original array up to the i-th element:
S-i = A-1 + A-2 + ... + A-i

You are required to create a function called 'prefix_sum' that takes two arguments as input, an integer N (1 <= N <= 10^5), and an array consisting of N integers A-1, A-2,..., A-N (0 <= A-i <= 1000). The code should return the sum of N integers S-1, S-2,..., S-N.

Note that the performace of the code is considered.

Here's a sample test case:\
`prefix_sum(5, [1 4 2 7 3]) => 44`\
Explaination:\
S-1 = 1\
S-2 = 1 + 4\
S-3 = 1 + 4 + 2\
S-4 = 1 + 4 + 2 + 7\
S-5 = 1 + 4 + 2 + 7 + 3\
S-1 + S-2 + S-3 + S-4 + S-5 = 4 + 5 + 7 + 14 + 17

Good luck!
